title: If we ever get SG Riven I say she spawns in like this
body:
https://pa1.narvii.com/5945/3bb759a1e3b0215ba7c4747826b6e08e0af80db1_hq.gif

https://media.giphy.com/media/rjLINlGpJYvvO/giphy.gif

Plus it would give me an excellent excuse to make more Riven related memes using Saber gifs

replies.body: "I ask of you...are you my summoner?"

I was thinking, for Pantheons VGU he can have the same helmet and function as Saber of Red from Fate: Apocrypha. Maybe you can toggle it on and off. 

I know you are not on the team, but since you may get the reference I was hoping youâ€™d pass it along. Please?

Upvote because best anime. 

~~Also Star Wars is cool I guess~~
Upvote because palapatine and saber in same meme
I wish they would of made more the back animations like Ahri for the true sailor moon effect. Show them basically naked (with the power around them) and then they transform into the Star Guardians.

> [{quoted}](name=MrHaZeYo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=M9s6iI1E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-30T23:38:57.867+0000)
>
> I wish they would of made more the back animations like Ahri for the true sailor moon effect. Show them basically naked (with the power around them) and then they transform into the Star Guardians.

Ohh god that brought back a funny memory of when i was like 4-5 years old. My sister loved sailor moon and I saw the transform animation looked at my dad in confusion because i had no idea what sailor moon was and got this "Yes, she was just naked"
Riven needs bleach reference skin. Her ult is bankai :)
We riot Riot if they don't do it.
SG riven would be better as MHX alter though.
